journal-meta.journal-title: European Heart Journal: Acute Cardiovascular Care

abstract.p: Corrigendum to De Hoog VC, Timmers L, Schoneveld AH, Wang JW et al (2013). Serum extracellular vesicle protein levels are associated with acute coronary syndrome European Heart Journal Acute Cardiovascular Care. 2(1) 53–60 [DOI:10.1177/2048872612471212].

body.p: The authors would like to note an error in the above paper. The affiliation for Professor Dr Dominique PV de Kleijn is written as:
1University Medical Center Utrecht, Utrecht, The Netherlands
4Interuniversity Cardiology Institute of the Netherlands, Utrecht, The Netherlands
This is incorrect it should read:
1University Medical Center Utrecht, Utrecht, The Netherlands
4Interuniversity Cardiology Institute of the Netherlands, Utrecht, The Netherlands
5Surgery NUS & Cardiovascular Research Institute, NUHS, Singapore
The authors apologise for this error and any confusion it may have caused.
